issues.title: Refine Client application definition
issues.author: RafaelAPB
issues.body:
Refine Client application definition.

Martin Gfeller [mgf=40acm.org@dmarc.ietf.org](mailto:mgf=40acm.org@dmarc.ietf.org) said "Do we need to say what we want to achieve with the application? Simply interacting could mean anything. As the introduction mentions only gateways, this is the first time "application" is used."

We should make it clearer that the client application implements the end-user business logic (that requires interoperability) and interacts with a gateway via API1.
